id: Pa Na (autonym pa53 na313; also Bana or Pana) is a Hmongic language spoken by about 1
author: Zhongpai 中排
silcode: and Xiapai 下排 of Chengbu County
glottocode: and Huangsangping Ethnic Miao Township 黄桑坪苗族乡
problems: China. Data was collected in December 1983.

id: Chen considers Pa Na to form a branch with She. There are similarities with Bunu as well. Pa Na language is not listed in Ethnologue.
